alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broward County through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Tamarac, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Coconut Creek, Oakland Park, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Cooper City, Wilton Manors, Broadview-Pompano Park, St. George, Pine Island Ridge, Village Park and Broadview Park. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
